nodes.text: Solar Promenade was a fathier female that mated with Hydian Dreams, and gave birth to the fathier named Hy-Stepping in 28 ABY as a result.

By around 34 ABY, Hy-Stepping had become a racing fathier on the planet Cantonica. Solar Promenade was listed as the fathier's dam on race programs, including one collected by the Resistance mechanic Rose Tico and added to her diary.
Solar Promenade was first mentioned in the 2018 replica journal The Last Jedi: Rose Tico: Resistance Fighter, which was written by Jason Fry.
